name: IronClaw Reference Review
description: Monitor openclaw/openclaw issues, PRs, and releases. Evaluate relevance to our standalone deployment and flag items needing attention.
process: Check openclaw/openclaw for new issues, PRs, and releases since last review (stored in Setec)
Fetch reference project CHANGELOG.md and package.json to detect version bumps
Evaluate each new item for relevance to our standalone deployment
For relevant issues: assess if our repo is affected and note in findings
For new releases: determine if any changes are worth adopting, note breaking changes
If critical security fix found: flag as high-severity finding requiring immediate action
Check for reference project CodeQL alerts using github_list_alerts that may apply to us
Update MEMORY.md with reference project activity summary
Store review timestamp in Setec for next run reference
Report findings with items that need attention

metrics.successCriteria: Reference project activity reviewed, relevant items flagged, memory updated
